Republic of Yukari Yuduki unique building: Technological University

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Cyashi, unique to Republic of Yukari Yuduki.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Science] Science. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if next to River. Republic of Yukari Yuduki unique improvement: Cyashi
Cyashi is a facility constructed by the Ainu race in modern times.
